alert.note: Alert for Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area; Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area; Eastern Baranof Island and Southern Admiralty Island; Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island; Southern Inner Channels (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 4:33PM AKST until December 27 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Central and Southern Panhandle including Sitka, Angoon, Juneau, Petersburg, Wrangell, Kake, Craig, Klawock, Ketchikan, and Metlakatla. * WHEN...From 9 PM Sunday to 9 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will develop late Sunday afternoon over the norther half of the area and spread southeast through the panhandle Sunday night. Highest snow rates will be late Sunday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
